apps.name: Reader
apps.subtitle: One place for all your photos and videos.
apps.localizedDescription:
Reader is an app available for iOS and Mac that lets you view and manage your photos and videos.

Please not that you will need to set up your own Backblaze B2 account to use this app.

versions.localizedDescription:
This update contains the following changes:

- Fixed ubershaders.
- Fixed fastmem crashing on iOS 16.

Please update Reader to version 1.0.0 before attempting to use it on iOS 16.

apps.versionDescription:
This update contains the following changes:

- Fixed ubershaders.
- Fixed fastmem crashing on iOS 16.

Please update Reader to version 1.0.0 before attempting to use it on iOS 16.

news.title: Reader Version 3.2.0 has been released!
news.caption: Finally, the public version of Reader version 3.2.0 has been released!
